concept.title: Desktop Client
concept.shortdesc: Application support updates to the desktop client must be made by running the installer on the Marvel Monitoring Agent installation media.

keywords.indexterm: Browser client and Java WebStart clientApplication support event

conbody.p: An application support version mismatch has been detected. Use the Marvel Monitoring installer to add the associated application support to the portal desktop client. Warning events indicate that the mismatch was found at client startup.

New or updated application support is available. Use the Marvel Monitoring installer to add the associated application support to the portal desktop client. Informational events indicate that the mismatch was found after logon to the portal server.
